page.title: 05The Sea Front Bridlington
page.content: Bridlington's sea front is a mixture. Much of the promenade parallel with the beach to the north of the harbour is lined with 3 & 4 storey hotels, flats & boarding houses dating from the Victorian and Edwardian periods. One of the main features of th front south of the harbour is the Spa theatre, the venue for films, shows and seasonal entertainment. There is also a floral pavilion, used for organ recitals in summer. A variety of amenities including crazy golf, an astroslide, dodgems and other rides are close by. Bridlington's swimming pool is being incorporated into a new leisure complex due to open in 1987. Much of the promenade to the north has landscaped gardens between the road and the sea front. There are several amusement arcades near the harbour.
